meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Gerry Matatics Sonam Shah Fred Vaughn Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7222.

td.p: Gerry Matatics, a speaker and writer from Scranton, Pennsylvania
Sonam Shah, a healthcare consultant originally from Greenville, South Carolina
Fred Vaughn, an Internet operations technician from Mineral Point, Wisconsin (whose 2-day cash winnings total $36,300)

tr.td: THE NORTHERNMOST STATE CAPITAL
(Alex: We'll give you a list.)
SCIENCE UPDATE
RADIO
HOUSE PROUD
SPORTS CENTER
"E-S-P-N"
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with an "E", and it'll be followed by "S-P-N", but not necessarily bunched up together.)

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Bismarck,
Boise,
Baton Rouge')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
Bismarck,
Boise,
Baton Rouge

tr.td: Fred
Sonam
Gerry
RECENT AFRICAN HISTORY
MUSIC
A LITTLE ALLITERATION
TV SHOWS BY CHARACTERS
(Alex: We'll give you the characters.)
IRISH PLAYWRIGHTS
ALWAYS READY: THE U.S. COAST GUARD

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Fred
Sonam
Gerry

div.onmouseover:

$7,500
Houston')

Sonam
Gerry

Gerry

(including 2 DDs),
2 W

1 W
(including 1 DD)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
